description: The native medium of software designs is code.

activities.name: Introduction to d3.js
activities.description: Adam Pere, software engineer at Involution Studios, will provide an introduction to d3.js, a powerful visualization library.

activities.description: In your groups, or individually, build a visualization.

assignments.description: Read Chapter 4: Exploring Data Visually of Data Points: Visualization That Means Something
